 Cluster tags using the DLBG interfaces.

Detailed Description

Class BoxGeneratorStrategy is an abstract base class that defines a Strategy pattern interface for operations to build boxes that cover a collection of tagged cells on a single AMR patch hierarchy level.

See also:
hier::PatchLevel
